lines.text: Damn the torpedoes, full steam ahead, Mr. Stringer!
Are you implying that I am unhinged?
Then what are you implying, pray?
Well, just that you are temporarily not yourself.

[testily]
One thing I can't stand is being disturbed when I'm curling my beard!

[to Craddock]
Embezzlement is one thing - proof of triple murder is another. Softly, softly catches monkey in a mousetrap.

[brandishing sword]
Now I propose to execute you on the spot...

[parrying]
You won't find it as easy as you think. I warn you. I was Ladies National Fencing Champion in 1931.
